content.text: Reading Comprehension & Vocabulary

En esta sección de reactivos difíciles, nos encontraremos con ejercicios basados únicamente en lecturas de distintos géneros literarios, entre ellos: relatos históricos, artículos de revista, correos de trabajo y novelas. Estos ejercicios corresponden a un nivel intermedio o intermedio alto. En ellos, debemos ser capaces de identificar características de estilo y estructura de diversos tipos de texto, lo que es conocido como “macro-features” del texto; las cuales nos permiten identificar de manera casi inmediata ciertas características al dar una lectura rápida. En cuanto a las habilidades de lectura, también se debe demostrar la habilidad de resumir un párrafo o el texto completo sin perdernos en los distractores, para lograr una comprensión adecuada de las ideas generales.

Es importante mencionar que el vocabulario en estos textos es más complejo que en el nivel mediano, ya que se enfoca también al uso de conectores y expresiones idiomáticas de un nivel intermedio alto. Sin embargo, aunque no conozcas el significado en sí de la palabra, las habilidades de entender e inferir según el contexto son las que mostrarán destreza en este nivel.
Los ejercicios 1 al 7 se basan en el siguiente párrafo:

The year was 1789, and France was on the brink of revolution. Francois, a young and passionate soldier, was tangled in the fervor of the times. As the streets of Paris erupted with protests and calls for change, Francois felt a sense of duty to his country and its people.

Despite his initial fear and hesitations, he joined the ranks of the revolutionaries, driven by a desire to fight for freedom and equality. Although his convictions were tested as he witnessed the chaos and violence that accompanied the revolution, he remained steadfast in his belief that change was necessary for the betterment of France.

Through battles and hardships, Francois emerged as a respected and courageous soldier, revered by his comrades for his unwavering dedication to the cause. He found himself at the forefront of pivotal moments in the revolution, standing alongside his fellow soldiers as they fought for liberty.

As the revolution raged on, Francois faced moments of doubt and anguish, grappling with the harsh realities of war and the sacrifices it demanded. Yet, through it all, he held onto a glimmer of hope that the tumultuous times would lead to a brighter future for France.

When the dust finally settled and the revolution ended, Francois looked back on the journey with a mixture of pride and sorrow. He had witnessed the fall of the old order and the birth of a new era, but he had also seen the toll it took on the lives of countless individuals.

Now, as France embarked on a tumultuous path towards rebuilding, he remained committed to serving his country, not just as a soldier, but as a protector of the values that had spurred the revolution in the first place. Though the road ahead was uncertain, Francois was determined to play his part in shaping the future of a nation that had been forever changed by the fervor of the French Revolution.

content.title: Question 1
content.question: In line 1, on the brink of means
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, además de conocer el idioma, se requiere tener una idea de cultura general, en este caso, el año en el que comenzó la revolución francesa. De igual manera, para descartar las opciones, podemos observar que no estamos hablando de una fecha en particular, ni de algo ya comenzado, sino de algo que va a suceder.

content.title: Question 2
content.question: In line 5, we could change Despite for the following options except:
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos, en primer lugar, leer bien la pregunta, nos está indicando que hay tres opciones que son sinónimos y una que no lo es. Ahora, debemos intercambiar la palabra “despite” por las opciones para observar cuál altera el significado.

content.title: Question 3
content.question: On lines 5-9, what is the main idea?
options: After all he witnessed, he decided to hold on to his idea of improving his country.
His convictions were tested several times, so he changed his mind.
He remained firm in his beliefs regarding the revolution.
He knew the revolution was necessary.
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos leer todas las líneas y notar que en las respuestas, tenemos palabras claves que están relacionadas con la lectura. Por lo general, tenemos estas respuestas como distractores. Ahora, al resumir esta idea tenemos dos partes, una causa y una consecuencia, así que nuestra respuesta debe tener ambas.

content.title: Question 4
content.question: In line 11, what does the word revered mean?
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos leer todo el párrafo y observar que las palabras que se mencionan “respected” (respetado), “courageous”(valiente), “found himself at the forefront of pivotal moments” (se encontró al frente de batalla en momentos esenciales) por lo que la palabra que estamos buscando, es una que tenga algo positivo.

content.title: Question 5
content.question: In line 16, the word it refers to
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos leer todo el párrafo, donde explica que Francois tuvo muchos momentos de angustia y duda, pero a pesar de todo eso, se aferró a ese rayo de luz para salir. Así que estamos haciendo referencia al 'a pesar de eso'.

content.title: Question 6
content.question: In line 16, the expression glimmer of hope could be substituted by the following options except:
content.optionw: En esta pregunta, nos enfrentamos a cuatro respuestas que incluyen la respuesta “hope”. Si no conocemos el significado de las palabras de manera individual, podemos guiarnos por el patrón o estructura. Las expresiones correctas son las que sigan el mismo patrón o estructura que la frase original.

content.title: Question 7
content.question: In which lines can we read Francois was convinced his participation helped change the future of his country?
options: Despite his initial fear and hesitations, he joined the ranks of the revolutionaries.
Francois emerged as a respected and courageous soldier.
He was determined to play his part in shaping the future of a nation that had been forever changed by the French Revolution.
Francois faced moments of doubt and anguish.
content.optionw: Aquí debemos leer bien la pregunta, puesto que en todas las respuestas podemos observar que Francois tuvo dudas, se levantó como un soldado, tuvo angustia. Pero lo más importante es ver la línea del tiempo dentro de nuestro relato, puesto que esta respuesta por lo general la encontramos como un resultado, como algo que vendría al final del texto.

content.text: Los ejercicios 8 al 13 se basan en el siguiente párrafo:
Empowering Women in Business: Breaking Barriers and Shaping the Future

In the present dynamic and constantly changing business spheres, women are making significant roles, reshaping industries, and breaking barriers that have long hindered their progress. As we celebrate their accomplishments and recognize the challenges they continue to overcome, we must highlight women's invaluable contributions to business and their transformative impact on economies worldwide.

One of the most notable aspects of the modern business environment is the increasing representation of women in leadership positions. From multinational corporations to entrepreneurial ventures, women assume central roles as CEOs, executives, and founders, driving innovation and fostering inclusive work cultures. This transformation reflects a more diverse and equitable workforce and brings fresh perspectives and approaches to decision-making and problem-solving.

Moreover, women entrepreneurs are forging their paths and redefining entrepreneurship. By fostering supportive communities and providing access to resources and opportunities, these initiatives are catalysts for advancing gender equality and promoting a more inclusive business ecosystem.

It's important to acknowledge that despite the progress made, gender disparities persist in many facets of the business world. Women continue to encounter challenges related to pay equity, representation in boardrooms, and access to funding for their ventures. Addressing these disparities requires a concerted effort from businesses, policymakers, and society as a whole to enact meaningful change and create a level playing field for all aspiring and established women in business.

Looking ahead, the momentum of women in business is poised to accelerate further, driven by ongoing advocacy, proactive measures, and the collective determination to shatter stereotypes and outdated norms. By embracing diversity, championing inclusivity, and fostering environments where women can thrive, we can unlock the full potential of talented individuals and propel businesses and economies to new heights of success.

Ultimately, the success of women in business is not solely a women's issue but a global imperative. Embracing their leadership, innovation, and expertise is not only the right thing to do but also the smart thing to do for a prosperous and thriving future.

In conclusion, women in business are catalysts for change, equipped with the vision, resilience, and leadership to drive businesses forward and shape a more inclusive and prosperous future for all. Their impact extends far beyond boardrooms and bottom lines, serving as an inspiration and a testament to the transformative power of diversity and gender equality in the business world.

As we commemorate their achievements and ongoing journey, let us continue to champion and support women in business, recognizing their indispensable role in shaping a dynamic and inclusive global business landscape.

content.title: Question 8
content.question: What type of text is this?
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos leer todo el texto de manera rápida y observar su estructura. Tenemos una idea principal de la cual se elaboran otras ideas. Tiene un título llamativo y habla de algo presente, algo factual.

content.title: Question 9
content.question: In line 7, what does the author want to say by using the word representation?
options: That there are women playing different roles in a wide variety of companies.
That women are becoming more empowered.
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos leer las líneas que desarrollan la idea después de la palabra “representation”, donde podemos observar que se mencionan distintos papeles y posiciones que juegan las mujeres en los negocios. Las otras ideas podrían hacer sentido, pero realmente no demuestran el por qué se habla de una representación de la mujer en puestos de liderazgo.

content.title: Question 10
content.question: In line 18, the word despite introduces:
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos leer toda la oración completa y no quedarnos con el “general”, que en este caso sería “introduce una idea”, porque realmente si bien cumple esta función, debemos prestar atención al tipo de idea que estamos leyendo. “Debemos reconocer que a pesar de esto, sucede esta otra cosa”.

content.title: Question 11
content.question: In line 20, these disparities refer to:
options: A concerted effort from business, policymakers and the society.
Challenges related to pay equity, representation in boardrooms and access to funding their ventures.
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos leer el contexto. Si hablamos de disparities (disparidades), es algo que tiene una connotación negativa, ahora, estos son impedimentos. En las líneas 18-20 podemos encontrar los retos a los que se enfrentan las mujeres.

content.title: Question 12
content.question: What is the purpose of this text?
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos prestar atención al vocabulario que se maneja, el cual no es negativo ni neutral. No estamos hablando de entretenimiento, puesto que el tema no es algo superficial. Si bien se describe cómo las mujeres se mueven en los negocios, esto es solamente una parte que nos sirve para el propósito final.

content.title: Question 13
content.question: What is the overall message from the text?
options: Women’s impact in business provides diversity and equality in this world. We should recognize their role.
Women encounter challenges in the working world and it’s not fair.
Women should be part of communities that have access to resources and opportunities.
Every day, there are more women in the business field.
content.optionw: Tres de las ideas presentadas en las respuestas son partes del texto, si bien son ideas explícitas, no expresan la idea principal, ni el mensaje del texto. Debemos leer todo el texto y pensar en la idea que podría englobar todos los párrafos.

content.text: Los ejercicios 14 al 18 se basan en el siguiente párrafo:
Dear Mr. Johnson,

Hope this finds you well. It has been brought to my attention that some members from your department have been missing our weekly meetings for months. It is important to mention they have not sent their reports on time either.As we are at a critical juncture in our company, with the impending renewal of all our permits and contracts, it is imperative that all members are prepared to implement the key points from our last certifications. Failure to do so may jeopardize their continued membership in our company.

We are well aware of the implications of all the hiring and training processes. We would like to avoid this, which is the main reason behind this email. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to help you prepare an action plan for solving this situation as soon as possible.

Best,
John Adler

content.title: Question 14
content.question: What type of text is this?
content.optionw: Aquí tenemos dos opciones posibles, por la estructura general podría ser una carta o un correo, sin embargo, en el texto se menciona lo que es, así que debemos leerlo con cuidado.

content.title: Question 15
content.question: The relationship between the author and the audience is:
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos, además de conocer distintas relaciones, saber un poco de jerarquías en los empleos. En este caso, podemos observar que la persona que escribe está en un rango más alto que el destinatario.

content.title: Question 16
content.question: What is the tone of the text?
content.optionw: Al leer el correo, podemos notar el tipo de vocabulario empleado, las palabras son un poco más complejas que lo que sería un correo informal, no se utilizan contracciones.

content.title: Question 17
content.question: In line 6, what does critical mean?
content.optionw: Para responder esta pregunta, debemos leer todo el párrafo de la línea 6 a la 9, donde se hace un resumen del estado de la compañía en ese momento. Podemos ver que es algo importante, así que la palabra “critical” tiene un significado de algo mayor.

content.title: Question 18
content.question: In line 8, what does the phrase failure to do so mean?
options: If people have tried unsuccessfully to complete a task.
When people fail over and over.
When you are able to complete a task.
content.optionw: Aquí estamos hablando de fallar la realización de algo en particular. Debemos leer desde la línea 6 para contestar la pregunta y no dejarnos distraer por las respuestas que contienen la palabra.

content.title: Question 19
content.question: The text is about
options: A girl taking a job opportunity away from home.
content.optionw: En este texto si, se mencionan las cuatro opciones, y podríamos decir que es una historia de amor, pero también se menciona la carrera de la protagonista y las marcas de lujo, pero el punto central de la historia es otra.

content.title: Question 20
content.question: Which type of text is this?
content.optionw: Para descartar las opciones, debemos observar las características generales del texto. En este caso, no hay algo que indique que hay un mensaje o que sea algo en primera persona. También debemos tomar en cuenta que no se exponen puntos de vista.

content.text: Los ejercicios 21 al 25 se basan en el siguiente párrafo:

It was a difficult decision, stay in Chicago or move to Paris. She knew she needed to change her life before she grew older in a relationship; she wasn't entirely happy with. It was an opportunity of a lifetime, but she was scared she wouldn't make it in a different country where she didn't even speak the language.

She was bound to send a reply within the following 24 hours, as there were over a hundred applicants for that same position. Working in advertisement was rewarding but also like swimming in a pond with sharks. It was a highly competitive environment with people playing dirty all the time.

It was 11:59 when Lisa decided to send that reply, she knew she would have to take a leap of faith and move across the sea to find out if her relationship was meant to work out or not, but more importantly, if she had the wood to become a successful advertisement agent. She was ready to work for the greatest luxury brands in the world. It was her first time working with high end products, but she knew that if she was called out for this opportunity, she had all she needed to become the best.

content.title: Question 21
content.question: On line 5, what does bound mean?
options: something that was not supposed to happen
Something that is certain to happen
content.optionw: Para contestar esta pregunta, debemos leer toda la oración, si seguimos la lectura, sabemos que no es algo que acaba de suceder, es algo a futuro y que de una manera u otra debe suceder.

content.title: Question 22
content.question: Who is the text about?
content.optionw: El texto comienza con “she”, (ella) y más adelante, en el texto se menciona el nombre de la protagonista. Si bien, hay otros personajes involucrados, al final debemos leer la mayor parte del texto para conocer cuál es el nombre de la protagonista.

content.title: Question 23
content.question: How would you describe the protagonist of the story?
content.optionw: Podríamos decir que está nerviosa, más no enojada. Es importante observar que a pesar de todo lo que está viviendo y la incertidumbre de lo que va a suceder, ella demuestra una actitud positiva ante el cambio.

content.title: Question 24
content.question: Who is the text about?
content.optionw: El texto comienza con “she”, (ella) y más adelante, en el texto se menciona el nombre de la protagonista. Si bien, hay otros personajes involucrados, al final debemos leer la mayor parte del texto para conocer cuál es el nombre de la protagonista.

content.title: Question 25
content.question: How would you describe the protagonist of the story?
content.optionw: Podríamos decir que está nerviosa, más no enojada. Es importante observar que a pesar de todo lo que está viviendo y la incertidumbre de lo que va a suceder, ella demuestra una actitud positiva ante el cambio.
